description: 网关配置向导 (端口/绑定/认证/Tailscale)

replacements.{ value: \"auto\", label: \"Auto (Loopba: { value: "auto", label: "自动 (回环 → 局域网)" }
replacements.\"IP address is required for custom bind: "自定义绑定模式需要 IP 地址"
replacements.\"Invalid IPv4 address (each octet must: "无效的 IPv4 地址 (每个八位字节必须是 0-255)"
replacements.hint: \"Recommended default (local + rem: hint: "推荐默认 (本地 + 远程)"
replacements.hint: \"Private HTTPS for your tailnet (: hint: "Tailnet 私有 HTTPS (Tailscale 设备)"
replacements.hint: \"Public HTTPS via Tailscale Funne: hint: "通过 Tailscale Funnel 的公共 HTTPS (互联网)"
replacements.\"Tailscale binary not found in PATH or: "在 PATH 或 /Applications 中未找到 Tailscale 二进制文件。"
replacements.\"You can continue setup, but serve/funn: "您可以继续设置，但 serve/funnel 将在运行时失败。"
replacements.\"Tailscale requires bind=loopback. Adju: "Tailscale 需要 bind=loopback。正在调整为 loopback。"
replacements.placeholder: \"Needed for multi-machine: placeholder: "多机或非回环访问需要"
